import math

def calculate_surface_area(side1, side2, base):
    s = (side1 + side2 + base) * 2
    area = math.sqrt(s * (s - side1) * (s - side2) * (s - base))
    return area

import math

    area = math.sqrt(s * (s - side1) * (s - side2) * (s - base))
    return area
